readable.title: 305749904_54a612fd1a
readable.content: A man is wearing a blue shirt with the word Mambo on it . A man is wearing a shirt that reads , " Mambo " with an image of a baby and a teddy bear . A man wears a t-shirt showing a baby humping a stuffed bear . A person wearing a blue mambo shirt has his back to the camera . The man is wearing a blue shirt .
